item.title: Krzysztof Dolega
item.description: Ruhr-Universität Bochum, Institut für Philosophie II Universitätsstr. 150 Bochum Germany 44801 krzysztof[dot]dolega[at]rub[dot]de Publications Edited Volumes * Smortchkova, J., **Dolega, K.** , & Schlicht, T. [Special Issue: Enactivism vs. Representationalism.](https://tandfonline.com/toc/rpex20/21/2?nav=tocList) *Philosophical Explorations*, 21(2). Journal Articles * **Dolega, K.** & Dewhurst, J.
